snippet: When a guest calls and says that the sitter canceled and can she bring her toddler to your adults-only party, what do you say? Almost all commenters agreed on this one.
abstract: When a guest calls and says that the sitter canceled and can she bring her toddler to your adults-only party, what do you say? Almost all commenters agreed on this one.

headline.main: Parental Quandary Considered: Should You Bring a Child to an Adult Party?
